document_data.name: Bracetel
document_data.mainbody: '''Bracetel''' was one of the Palace families who served the Crown of [[Cormyr]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century DR, Bracetels were career officiers for multiple generations. Like other officers and chamberlains, the Bracetel family resided at [[Cormyr's Royal Court]] south of [[Castle Obarskyr]].
